z3Program:
from z3 import *
from z3_all_models import *

position0 = Int('position0')
mBeginIndex0 = Int('mBeginIndex0')
mEndIndex0 = Int('mEndIndex0')

constraints = [
  Not(And(mBeginIndex0 <= position0, position0 <= mEndIndex0))
]

solver = Solver()
for constraint in constraints:
  solver.add(constraint)

models = list(all_smt(solver))
for model in models: print(model)
symPyProgram:
from sympy import Symbol
from sympy import simplify
from sympy.core.relational import Eq, Ne, StrictGreaterThan, StrictLessThan, LessThan, GreaterThan
from sympy.printing import ccode

position = Symbol('position', integer=True)
mBeginIndex = Symbol('mBeginIndex', integer=True)
mEndIndex = Symbol('mEndIndex', integer=True)
path_conjunction = (~(((LessThan(mBeginIndex, position)) & (LessThan(position, mEndIndex)))))
print(ccode(simplify(path_conjunction)))
